Name: Factory of Sweets
About the game: Factory of Sweets - is a classic 'plumber' puzzle game. You're an employee of a huge candy company. Rotate the pipes to send the raw materials for the production of sweets to a special device. But hurry up, time is limited, the machines are running at maximum capacity, excessive pressure inside the pipes will cause an explosion. Kids are waiting for candy, Good Luck!
